text: 11:37 1 Atriviba 21:13; 2 Atriviba 1:8; 2 Eghaghaniba 24:21; Aposel 7:58; 14:19Apaniba dagɨabar marazigh inifi. Ezɨ marasi, apaniba soba inigha men namnaba abɨzi me akuabagh iri. Marazi, apaniba mɨdorozir sababar me mɨsozima me ariaghiri. Ezɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itir maba, me sipsipɨn iniba ko memen iniba, me inibar mɨn da ikegha zui. Egha me onganarazibagh amua ikia biziba bar puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumaziba osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzaziba me ganɨga paza me gami.
